name: Amazon CloudWatch Events
short: A service in AWS that delivers a near real-time stream of system events that describe changes in AWS resources.
description: Amazon CloudWatch Events is a service that delivers a near real-time stream of system events reflecting changes in AWS resources. It allows you to set up rules to match events and route them to one or more target functions or applications. It can trigger AWS Lambda functions, Amazon SNS topics, Amazon SQS queues, and more. This service aids in automation, security, compliance, and operational tasks, providing a responsive AWS environment. CloudWatch Events ensures a proactive, automated, and agile approach to system management.
